content.raw:
Thanks for the report. Answering your points:

1. I’m afraid that we have a problem with the gazebo9 last release. I’m investigating it, will post updates in #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2690/libgazebo9-dev-deb-package-not-correctly

2. Gazebo directly should have nothing to do with the libdrm library. Not sure if one of the dependencies could be affecting it. We will need instructions to reproduce the problem that involves Gazebo participation in some way.

3.  Well know problem for the version provided by Ubuntu repositories. Please check #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2607/error-restcc-205-during-startup-gazebo for workaround while we solve it.

Please reopen (or create a new issue) if you find something relevant related to point 2.
content.html:
Thanks for the report. Answering your points:

  1. I’m afraid that we have a problem with the gazebo9 last release. I’m investigating it, will post updates in #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2690/libgazebo9-dev-deb-package-not-correctly

  2. Gazebo directly should have nothing to do with the libdrm library. Not sure if one of the dependencies could be affecting it. We will need instructions to reproduce the problem that involves Gazebo participation in some way.

  3. Well know problem for the version provided by Ubuntu repositories. Please check #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2607/error-restcc-205-during-startup-gazebo for workaround while we solve it.

Please reopen (or create a new issue) if you find something relevant related to point 2.
